org.regele.totask2.model

Interface TaskAssignmentRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<TaskAssignment,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<TaskAssignment,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<TaskAssignment,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<TaskAssignment,Long>

    public interface TaskAssignmentRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<TaskAssignment,Long>
    data access layer for taskAssignments.

    • Method Summary

      all assignments for given task. used in admin ui.
      List<TaskAssignment> findByUserAndPeriod(long userId, Date from, Date until)
      find all tasks for the given project that could be worked on at least one day in given timespan from-until.

      • findByUserAndPeriod

        @Query(value="select ta from TaskAssignment ta where ta.user.id = :userId and ta.startingFrom <= :until and ( ta.until is null or ta.until >= :from )")
List<TaskAssignment> findByUserAndPeriod(@Param(value="userId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                  long userId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                  @Param(value="from")
                                                                                                                                                                                                  Date from,
                                                                                                                                                                                                  @Param(value="until")
                                                                                                                                                                                                  Date until)
        find all tasks for the given project that could be worked on at least one day in given timespan from-until. used on weekEntry page.
